function.name: remember_about_person
function.description: Let me search my memories about what I know about everyone I've met to answer your question. I can filter by name or Telegram ID if I need to, but can also omit those to search across everyone.

query.description: The question or topic you want me to recall about the person.

telegram_id.description: The Telegram ID of the person you're asking about. If you don't provide one, I'll search memories across everyone.

person_name.description: The name of the person you're asking about. Use this to refine the search if the Telegram ID is unknown or ambiguous.

k.description: How many memories should I try to recall?
